title: 46 of 2022), after consultation with the Minister for Health, hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Assisted Decision-Making (Capacity)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Assisted Decision-Making (Capacity) 

(Amendment) Act 2022 (Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited assisted decision-making (capacity) (amendment) act 2022 (commencement) (no 2) order 2023

title: 46 of 2022), after consultation with the Minister for Health, hereby order as
heading: In this Order “Act of 2015” means the Assisted Decision-Making
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order “Act of 2015” means the Assisted Decision-Making 

(Capacity) Act 2015 (No. 64 of 2015).
text_norm: 2 order act 2015 mean assisted decision-making (capacity) act 2015 (no 64 2015)

title: 46 of 2022), after consultation with the Minister for Health, hereby order as
heading: 3. The 26th day of April 2023 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
3. The 26th day of April 2023 is appointed as the day on which the 
(Capacity) 

following provisions of 
(Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 46 of 2022) shall come into operation: 

the Assisted Decision-Making 

(a) Part 1, insofar as it is not already in operation; 

(b) Part 2, other than – 

(i) 

paragraphs (a) and (b) of section 4, 

(ii) 

section 7(c) insofar as it relates to the insertion of 
subparagraph (iii) into section 8(7)(d) of the Act of 2015, 

(iii) section 30(b), 

(iv) section 44 insofar as it relates to the insertion of 
subsections (1) and (2) of section 54A into the Act of 
2015, 

(v) 

section 68 insofar as it relates to the insertion of section 
79(2)(c) into the Act of 2015, 

(vi) section 71(b), 

(vii) sections 72 to 77, 

(viii) section 85, and 

(ix) section 88(d); 

(c) Part 3, insofar as it is not already in operation, other than 
paragraphs (b) and (c) of subsection (1) of, and subsection (2) 
of, section 100. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 28th April, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [194] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

26 April, 2023. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth.
